  • Field Details

    • player1

      public static Player player1

    • player2

      public static Player player2

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()
      Constructor for GameController. Initializes the game state to NOT_STARTED.

  • Method Details

    • addObserver

      public static void addObserver(GameObserver observer)
      Adds an observer to the list of observers.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer to add.

    • switchPanel

      public static void switchPanel(JPanel panel)
      Switches the current panel to the specified panel.
      Parameters:
      panel - The panel to switch to. The current panel is removed and the new panel is added. The frame is then revalidated and repainted. If an exception occurs, an error message is displayed.

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame()
      Initializes the game. If the game is already in progress, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the main frame is initialized and the main menu view is selected.

    • selectMainMenuView

      public static void selectMainMenuView()
      Selects the main menu view. If the game is already in progress, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the main menu view is selected.

    • selectFactionView

      public static void selectFactionView()
      Selects the faction selection view. If the game is already in progress, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the faction selection view is selected.

    • shipPlacementView

      public static void shipPlacementView()
      Selects the ship placement view. If the game is not in the SELECTING_FACTIONS state, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the ship placement view is selected.

    • gameView

      public static void gameView()
      Selects the game view. If the game is not in the PLACING_SHIPS state, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the game view is selected.

    • victoryView

      public static void victoryView(String winner)
      Selects the victory view. If the game is not in the GAME_OVER state, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the victory view is selected.
      Parameters:
      winner - The name of the winner.

    • surrender

      public static void surrender()
      Selects the defeat view. Allow the player to surrender the game. If the game is not in the GAME_OVER state, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the defeat view is selected.

    • selectFaction

      public static void selectFaction(Faction faction1, Faction faction2, int gridSize)
      Selects the defeat view. If the game is not in the GAME_OVER state, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the defeat view is selected.
      Parameters:
      faction1 - The faction of player 1.
      faction2 - The faction of player 2.
      gridSize - The size of the board.

    • setAiStrategy

      public static void setAiStrategy(AiStrategy aiStrategy)
      Sets the AI strategy.
      Parameters:
      aiStrategy - The AI strategy.

    • aiShipPlacement

      public static void aiShipPlacement()
      Places all ships on the board. If the game is not in the PLACING_SHIPS state, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, all ships are placed on the board.

    • combatLoop

      public static String combatLoop(int row, int col)
      Dictate the combat loop. If the game is not in the GAME_IN_PROGRESS state, a warning message is displayed. Otherwise, the combat loop is dictated.
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the cell.
      col - The column of the cell.
      Returns:
      The result of the attack. Check if the player is an AI. If the player is an AI, the AI makes a move. Otherwise, the player makes a move. Check if the game is over.

    • attackPhase

      public static String attackPhase(Board ennemyBoard, int finalI, int finalJ)
      Dictate the attack phase.
      Parameters:
      ennemyBoard - The board of the opponent.
      finalI - The row of the cell.
      finalJ - The column of the cell.
      Returns:
      The result of the attack.

    • aiTurn

      public static void aiTurn(Board playerBoard, Board aiTrackingBoard)
      Dictate the AI turn.
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - The board of the player.
      aiTrackingBoard - The tracking board of the AI.

    • checkGameState

      public static void checkGameState()
      Check the game state. If the game is over, the victory view is selected. Otherwise, the game is in progress.

    • newGame

      public static void newGame()
      Starts a new game. Resets the game state and selects the faction selection view.

    • goToMainMenu

      public static void goToMainMenu()
      Returns to the main menu. Resets the game state and selects the main menu view.

    • getBoardSize

      public static int getBoardSize()
      Getter for boardSize.
      Returns:
      The size of the board.
